mapper.sql: ID, ORGNO, BINDID, CREATEDATE, CREATEUSER, UPDATEDATE, UPDATEUSER, WORKFLOWID, WORKFLOWSTEPID, ISEND, GSID, GSDM, GSMC, BMID, BMMC, CZRZH, CZRXM, KHBH, KHMC, WHSJ, WHLXDM
mapper.insert: insert into BO_CRM_CLIENT_LOG (ID, ORGNO, BINDID, CREATEDATE, CREATEUSER, UPDATEDATE, UPDATEUSER, WORKFLOWID, WORKFLOWSTEPID, ISEND, GSID, GSDM, GSMC, BMID, BMMC, CZRZH, CZRXM, KHBH, KHMC, WHSJ, WHLXDM ) values (BO_CRM_CLIENT_LOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{orgno,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{bindid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createuser,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateuser,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{workflowid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{workflowstepid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isend,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gsid,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{gsdm,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{gsmc,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{bmid,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{bmmc,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{czrzh,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{czrxm,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{khbh,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{khmc,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{whlxdm,jdbcType=OTHER} )

mapper.update:
update BO_CRM_CLIENT_LOG
ORGNO = #{orgno,jdbcType=OTHER},
BINDID = #{bindid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATEUSER = #{createuser,jdbcType=OTHER},
UPDATEDATE = #{updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATEUSER = #{updateuser,jdbcType=OTHER},
WORKFLOWID = #{workflowid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WORKFLOWSTEPID = #{workflowstepid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ISEND = #{isend,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GSID = #{gsid,jdbcType=OTHER},
GSDM = #{gsdm,jdbcType=OTHER},
GSMC = #{gsmc,jdbcType=OTHER},
BMID = #{bmid,jdbcType=OTHER},
BMMC = #{bmmc,jdbcType=OTHER},
CZRZH = #{czrzh,jdbcType=OTHER},
CZRXM = #{czrxm,jdbcType=OTHER},
KHBH = #{khbh,jdbcType=OTHER},
KHMC = #{khmc,jdbcType=OTHER},
WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHLXDM = #{whlxdm,jdbcType=OTHER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update BO_CRM_CLIENT_LOG set ORGNO = #{orgno,jdbcType=OTHER}, BINDID = #{bindid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATEUSER = #{createuser,jdbcType=OTHER}, UPDATEDATE = #{updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATEUSER = #{updateuser,jdbcType=OTHER}, WORKFLOWID = #{workflowid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WORKFLOWSTEPID = #{workflowstepid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ISEND = #{isend,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GSID = #{gsid,jdbcType=OTHER}, GSDM = #{gsdm,jdbcType=OTHER}, GSMC = #{gsmc,jdbcType=OTHER}, BMID = #{bmid,jdbcType=OTHER}, BMMC = #{bmmc,jdbcType=OTHER}, CZRZH = #{czrzh,jdbcType=OTHER}, CZRXM = #{czrxm,jdbcType=OTHER}, KHBH = #{khbh,jdbcType=OTHER}, KHMC = #{khmc,jdbcType=OTHER}, WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WHLXDM = #{whlxdm,jdbcType=OTHER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select u.userid,u.username,d.id bmid, d.departmentname bmmc, c.id gsid, c.companyno gsdm, c.companyname gsmc from ORGUSER u left join ORGDEPARTMENT d on u.departmentid=d.id left join ORGCOMPANY c on d.companyid=c.id where u.userid=#{userid}
select s.uuid UUID from sys_business_metadata p join sys_business_metadata_map s on p.id = s.metadata_id where s.field_name = #{fieldName} and p.entity_name = #{tableName}
